float mFogDensity

Detailed Description

A stored image based sky colour model. This particular model takes a stored bitmap as the sky gradients map.
Author:
Jesús Alonso Abad
Version:
0.1

Gets the interpolated colour between two pixels from an image.

Parameters:
x The horizontal coordinate in the range [0, 1].
height The height at which the pixels are located in the range [0, 1] (will be converted to integer).
img The lookup image.
Returns:
The interpolated colour.

Note:
